scheduler.name: UniPCMultistepScheduler
scheduler.label: UniPC Multistep Scheduler
scheduler.description: The UniPC Multistep Scheduler is used for WAN 2.2 A14B T2V.

inputs.prompt: An ancient floating kingdom drifts above an ocean of clouds at dawn, colossal stone ruins wrapped in vines and glowing runes. Massive waterfalls pour from the edges of the islands into the mist below. A dragon circles slowly through the sky, its wings catching the light as scales shimmer with ember-like reflections. A lone mage stands on a broken balcony, robes and long hair flowing in the wind, magic gathering in their hands as luminous arcane symbols spiral outward. The camera begins with a sweeping aerial orbit, then glides forward into a dramatic mid-shot behind the mage. Golden god rays pierce through towering clouds, magical particles drift through the air, volumetric fog rolls between the ruins. Ultra-detailed fantasy realism, cinematic lighting, epic scale, smooth motion, rich color grading, mythic and awe-inspiring tone.
inputs.negative_prompt: lowres, text, error, cropped, worst quality, low quality, jpeg artifacts, ugly, duplicate, morbid, mutilated, out of frame, extra fingers, mutated hands, poorly drawn hands, poorly drawn face, mutation, deformed, blurry, dehydrated, bad anatomy, bad proportions, extra limbs, cloned face, disfigured, gross proportions, malformed limbs, missing arms, missing legs, extra arms, extra legs, fused fingers, too many fingers, long neck, username, watermark, signature
